title: Exclusive corporate air travel management technology from Mystifly - 247 TravelDesk
text:
Wednesday 26th August 2015 Exclusive corporate air travel management technology from Mystifly - 247 TravelDesk 
Travel Management at organisation level can be quite a task with high travel expenses, adhoc bookings and cancellations, inconsistency in approvals and policy adherence resulting in travel mismanagement and wastage. Not anymore, with Mystifly 247 TravelDesk Corporates and Corporate TMCs can reduce their travel spends by almost 20-40%. 247 TravelDesk is an approval and self-booking tool for corporates and TMCs that enables employees to self-book and manage complex, multi-segment itineraries. Corporate employees can select from the widest range of travel providers including traditional full-service airlines as well as low cost airlines. 247 TravelDesk is an easy to use booking system that reduces booking time, lowers travel agent fees and ensures bookings comply with corporate travel policies. TMCs can leverage the advantage of customization offered at the backend by Mystifly to manage corporate air travel. Advantages of using 247 TravelDesk - Travel expense management
